elements.text: You're at a family dinner and notice a slight change in your mood but are unsure why. You feel so off that you're not sure you want to finish the meal. You decide to focus on the food you're eating and the family around you, and this mindfulness helps you feel...

elements.name: A Moody Dinner_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
